title: 8.5.5 Create KB search functionality
body:
## Parent Issue
#39 - 8.5 Knowledge Base Integration

## Objective
Implement keyword search across KB entries for finding relevant controls and best practices.

## Implementation

```python
# src/ib_platform/kb/service.py (continued)

def search(
    self,
    query: str,
    limit: int = 10,
) -> list[KBEntry]:
    """Search KB entries by keyword."""
    query_lower = query.lower()
    results = []

    # Search controls
    for framework, controls in self._frameworks.items():
        for control in controls:
            if (
                query_lower in control.name.lower()
                or query_lower in control.description.lower()
            ):
                results.append(
                    KBEntry(
                        entry_type="control",
                        framework=framework,
                        control_name=control.name,
                        description=control.description,
                        guidance=control.implementation_guidance,
                    )
                )

    # Search practices
    for service, practices in self._services.items():
        for practice in practices:
            if (
                query_lower in practice.title.lower()
                or query_lower in practice.description.lower()
            ):
                results.append(
                    KBEntry(
                        entry_type="best_practice",
                        service=service,
                        control_name=practice.title,
                        description=practice.description,
                        guidance=practice.implementation,
                    )
                )

    return results[:limit]


def get_statistics(self) -> dict:
    """Return KB statistics."""
    return {
        "frameworks": len(self._frameworks),
        "controls": sum(len(c) for c in self._frameworks.values()),
        "services": len(self._services),
        "best_practices": sum(len(p) for p in self._services.values()),
        "patterns": len(self._patterns),
        "remediation_templates": len(self._remediation),
    }
```

## Files to Create
- `tests/ib_platform/kb/test_search.py`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Search returns relevant entries
- [ ] Search matches title and description
- [ ] Results limited by parameter
- [ ] Search is case-insensitive
- [ ] Statistics method works
- [ ] Unit tests for search functionality

## Estimated Time
1 hour
